execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the EU sales database with their id, country (region) and timestamp to be used as the join/registration date.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, country, updated_at AS join_timestamp FROM customers;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the US sales database with their id, country (region) and timestamp to be used as the join/registration date.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, country, updated_at AS join_timestamp FROM customers;
